item.title: Bitcoin’s Price May Be Headed To $25,000 Levels After Parabolic Break, Says Peter Brandt
item.description: In a post on X, Peter Brandt said Bitcoin is exhibiting “exponential decay,” meaning each rally yields smaller percentage gains as it matures.

item.title: Is TSLA Stock Fully Priced For Autonomy? Here's What Gary Black Thinks
item.description: Black added that while the Tesla stock has the potential to go higher, his caution is driven by weak fourth-quarter volumes for the EV maker.
